original: atha bhagavān vairocanastathāgataḥ punarapīdaṃ prajñāpāramitānayaṃ sarvatathāgataśāntadharmatābhisaṃbodhinirhāraṃ deśayati sma - vajrasamatābhisaṃbodhi(dhau?)
analyzed: atha bhagavān vairocanaḥ tathāgataḥ punar api idam prajñāpāramitā nayam sarva tathāgata śānta dharmatā abhisaṃbodhi nirhāram deśayati sma vajra samatā abhisaṃbodhi dhau
mahā bodhi vajra dṛḍha tayā
artha samatā abhisaṃbodhau mahā bodhiḥ eka artha tayā
dharma samatā abhisaṃbodhau mahā bodhiḥ svabhāva śuddha tayā
sarva samatā abhisaṃbodhau mahā bodhiḥ sarva a vikalpana tayā iti

original: atha bhagavān sarvaduṣṭavinayaśākyamunistathāgataḥ punarapi sarvadharmasamatāvijayasaṃgrahaṃ nāma prajñāpāramitānirhāraṃ deśayāmāsa - rāgāprapañcatayā*
analyzed: atha bhagavān sarvaduṣṭavinayaśākyamuniḥ tathāgataḥ punar api sarva dharma samatā vijaya saṃgraham nāma prajñāpāramitā nirhāram deśayāmāsa rāga aprapañca tayā
dveṣa aprapañca tayā moha aprapañca tā
moha aprapañca tayā sarva dharma aprapañca tā
sarva dharma aprapañca tayā prajñāpāramitā prapañca tā veditavyā iti

original: (Adhś, Vaidya 91) atha bhagavān svabhāvaśuddhastathāgataḥ punarapīdaṃ sarvadharmasamatāvalokiteśvarajñānamudraṃ
analyzed: adhū vaidya atha bhagavān svabhāvaśuddhaḥ tathāgataḥ punar api idam sarva dharma samatā avalokita īśvara jñāna mudram

original: nāma prajñāpāramitānayaṃ deśayāmāsa - sarvarāgaviśuddhitā loke dveṣaviśuddhitāyai saṃvartate /
analyzed: nāma prajñāpāramitā nayam deśayāmāsa sarva rāga viśuddhi tā loke dveṣa viśuddhi tāyai saṃvartate
sarva mala viśuddhi tā loke dveṣa viśuddhi tāyai saṃvartate
sarva mala viśuddhi tā loke sarva pāpa viśuddhi tāyai saṃvartate
sarva dharma viśuddhi tā loke sarva sattva viśuddhi tāyai saṃvartate
sarva jñāna viśuddhi tā loke prajñāpāramitā viśuddhyai saṃvartate iti
atha bhagavān sarva traidhātuka adhipatiḥ tathāgataḥ punar api sarva tathāgata abhiṣeka saṃbhava jñāna garbham

original: nāma prajñāpāramitānayaṃ deśayāmāsa - abhiṣekadānaṃ sarvatraidhātukarājyapratilambhāya saṃvartate /
analyzed: nāma prajñāpāramitā nayam deśayāmāsa abhiṣeka dānam sarva traidhātuka rājya pratilambhāya saṃvartate
artha dānam sarva āśā paripūraye saṃvartate
dharma dānam sarva dharmatā prāptaye saṃvartate
āmiṣa dānam sarva kāya vāc citta sukha pratilambhāya saṃvartate iti
atha bhagavān sarva tathāgata jñāna mudrā prāpta sarva tathāgata muṣṭi dharaḥ tathāgataḥ śāśvata

original: punarapi sarvatathāgatajñānamudrādhiṣṭhānavajraṃ nāma prajñāpāramitānayaṃ deśayāmāsa - sarvatathāgatakāyamudrāparigrahaḥ sarvatathāgatatvāya  #
analyzed: punar api sarva tathāgata jñāna mudrā adhiṣṭhāna vajram nāma prajñāpāramitā nayam deśayāmāsa sarva tathāgata kāya mudrā parigrahaḥ sarva tathāgata tvāya
saṃvartate
vāc mudrā parigrahaḥ sarva dharma pratilambhāya saṃvartate
citta mudrā parigrahaḥ sarva samādhi pratilambhāya saṃvartate
vajra mudrā pratigrahaḥ sarva kāya vāc citta vajra sattva sarva uttama siddhaye saṃvartate iti

original: atha bhagavān sarvadharmāprapañcastathāgataḥ punarapi cakrākṣaraparivartaṃ nāma prajñāpāramitānayaṃ deśayāmāsa - śūnyāḥ sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvayogena,
analyzed: atha bhagavān sarva dharma aprapañcaḥ tathāgataḥ punar api cakrākṣaraparivartam nāma prajñāpāramitā nayam deśayāmāsa śūnyāḥ sarva dharmāḥ niḥsvabhāva yogena
nirnimittāḥ sarva dharmāḥ nirnimitta tām upādāya
apraṇihitāḥ sarva dharmāḥ a praṇidhāna yogena
prakṛti prabhāsvarāḥ prajñāpāramitā pariśuddhyai iti

original: atha bhagavān sarvatathāgatacakrāntargatastathāgataḥ punarapi mahācakrapraveśaṃ nāma prajñāpāramitānayaṃ deśayāmāsa - vajrasamatāpraveśaḥ sarvatathāgatacakrapraveśāya  #
analyzed: atha bhagavān sarva tathāgata cakra antargataḥ tathāgataḥ punar api mahācakrapraveśam nāma prajñāpāramitā nayam deśayāmāsa vajra samatā praveśaḥ sarva tathāgata cakra praveśāya
saṃvartate
artha samatā praveśaḥ mahā bodhisattva cakra praveśāya saṃvartate
dharma samatā praveśaḥ sarva dharma cakra praveśāya saṃvartate
sarva samatā praveśaḥ sarva cakra praveśāya saṃvartate iti

original: atha bhagavān sarvapūjāvidhivistarabhājanastathāgataḥ punarapi sarvapūjāgryaṃ nāma prajñāpāramitānayaṃ deśayāmāsa - bodhicittotpādanatā sarvatathāgatapūjāvidhivistaraḥ
analyzed: atha bhagavān sarvapūjāvidhivistarabhājanaḥ tathāgataḥ punar api sarvapūjāgryam nāma prajñāpāramitā nayam deśayāmāsa bodhi citta utpādana tā sarva tathāgata pūjā vidhi vistaraḥ
sarva sattvadhātu paritrāṇa tā sarva tathāgata pūjā vidhi vistaraḥ
prajñāpāramitā likhana lekhana dhāraṇa vācana uccāraṇa bhāvana pūjana karmaṇa karma
sarva tathāgata pūjā vidhi vistaraḥ iti

original: atha khalu bhagavān sarvavinayasamarthastathāgataḥ punarapīdaṃ jñānamuṣṭiparigrahaṃ
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān sarva vinaya samarthaḥ tathāgataḥ punar api idam jñāna muṣṭi parigraham

original: sarva[sa]ttvavinayajñānagarbhaṃ nāma prajñāpāramitānayaṃ deśayāmāsa - sarvasattvasamatāyāṃ krodhasamatā,
analyzed: sarva sattva vinaya jñāna garbham nāma prajñāpāramitā nayam deśayāmāsa sarva sattva samatāyām krodha samatā
sarva sattva vinayana tāyām krodha vinayana tā
sarva sattva dharmatāyām krodha dharmatā
sarva sattva vajra tāyām krodha vajra tā
tat kasya hetoḥ
sarva sattva vinayaḥ bodhiḥ iti

original: (Adhś, Vaidya 92) atha bhagavān sarvadharmasamatāpratiṣṭhitastathāgataḥ punarapīdaṃ sarvadharmāgryaṃ nāma prajñāpāramitānayaṃ deśayāmāsa -
analyzed: adhū vaidya  atha bhagavān sarva dharma samatā pratiṣṭhitaḥ tathāgataḥ punar api idam sarva dharma agryam nāma prajñāpāramitā nayam deśayāmāsa
sarva artha tayā prajñāpāramitā artha tā
sarva dharma tayā prajñāpāramitā dharma tā
sarva karma tayā prajñāpāramitā karma tā veditavyā iti

original: atha bhagavāṃstathāgato vairocanaḥ punarapi sarvasattvādhiṣṭhānaṃ nāma prajñāpāramitānayaṃ deśayāmāsa - sarvasattvāstathāgatagarbhāḥ samantabhadramahābodhisattvasarvātmatayo(yā?)
analyzed: atha bhagavān tathāgataḥ vairocanaḥ punar api sarvasattvādhiṣṭhānam nāma prajñāpāramitā nayam deśayāmāsa sarva sattvāḥ tathāgata garbhāḥ
vajragarbhā sarva sattvāḥ vajragarbha abhiṣikta tayā
dharma garbhāḥ sarva sattvāḥ sarva vāc pravartana tayā
karma garbhāḥ sarva sattvāḥ sarva sattva karaṇa tā prayoga tayā iti
atha bhagavān anantā paryantā niṣṭhaḥ tathāgataḥ nantā paryantā niṣṭha dharmā punar api asya
kalpasya pariniṣṭhā adhiṣṭhāna artham idam sarva dharma samatā parininadhiṣṭhānavajram nāma
prajñāpāramitā nayam deśayāmāsa prajñāpāramitā ananta tayā sarva tathāgata ananta tā
prajñāpāramitā paryanta tayā sarva tathāgata aparyanta tā
prajñāpāramitā anaikatayā sarva dharma anaikatā
prajñāpāramitā pariniṣṭha tayā sarva dharma a pariniṣṭha tā bhavati
atha bhagavān vairocanaḥ sarva tathāgata guhya dharmatā prāpta sarva dharma aprapañcaḥ punar api
idam mahāsukha vajra amogha nāma vajra amogha dharmatā prajñāpāramitā mukham paramam anādi nidhana madhyam
deśayāmāsa mahā roga uttama siddhiḥ mahā bodhisattvānām mahā sukha uttama siddhyai saṃvartate
mahā sukha uttama siddhiḥ mahā bodhisattvānām sarva tathāgata mahā bodhi uttama siddhyai saṃvartate
sarva tathāgata mahā bodhi uttama siddhiḥ mahā bodhisattvānām sarva mahā māra pramardana uttama siddhyai saṃvartate
sarva mahā māra pramardana uttama siddhiḥ mahā bodhisattvānām sakala mahā traidhātuka aiśvarya uttama siddhyai saṃvartate
sakala mahā traidhātuka aiśvarya uttama siddhiḥ mahā bodhisattvānām aśeṣa anavaśeṣa sarva sattvadhātu paritrāṇa sarva sattva hita sukha parama atyanta mahā sukha uttama siddhyai
saṃvartate iti
tat kasya hetoḥ
yāvat bhava adhiṣṭhāne bhavanti vara sūrayaḥ
tāvat sattva artham atulam śakyā kartum anirvṛtāḥ
sarva karma viśuddhyā tu bhava śuddhāḥ bhavanti ha
rāga ādi vinayaḥ loke ābhava ātmā asakṛt sadā

original: teṣāṃ viśodhanārthaṃ tu vinayaṃ jñātavān svayam // 3 //
analyzed: teṣām viśodhana artham tu vinayam jñātavān svayam

original: yathā padmaṃ suraktaṃ tu rāgadoṣairna lipyate /
analyzed: yathā padmam su raktam tu rāga doṣaiḥ na lipyate
vāsa doṣaiḥ bhave nityam na lipyante jagat hitām
mahā rāga viśuddhāḥ tu mahā saukhyāḥ mahādhanāḥ

original: tridhātvīśvaratāṃ prāptā arthaṃ kurvantu taṃ dṛḍham // 5 //iti //
analyzed: tri dhātu īśvara tām prāptāḥ artham kurvantu tam dṛḍham iti
adhyardhaśatikā prajñāpāramitā samāptā
